verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- now there was אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish Now there was a man; מִבִּן־ mib-bin- ימין ya-min כמִבִּנְיָמִ֗ין <S%H1144><s%> mib-bin-ya-Min, Benjamin קוּ֠שְׁמוֹ <S%H8034><s%> u-she-mo whose name קִ֣ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> kish [was] Kish בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֲבִיאֵ֞ל <S%H22><s%> 'a-vi-'El of Abiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צְר֧וֹר <S%H6872><s%> tze-Ror of Zeror בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son בְּכוֹרַ֛ת <S%H1064><s%> be-cho-Rat of Bechorath בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֲפִ֖יחַ <S%H647><s%> 'a-Fi-ach of Aphiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man יְמִינִ֑י <S%H3227><s%> ye-mi-Ni; right גִּבּ֖וֹר <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bor a mighty חָֽיִל׃ <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil. of power

וְלוֹ־ ve-lov- הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah had בֵ֜ן <S%H1121><s%> ven And he had a son וּשְׁמ֤וֹ <S%H8034><s%> u-she-Mo whose name שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul [was] Saul בָּח֣וּר <S%H970><s%> ba-Chur a choice young man וָט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> va-Tov, and a goodly וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein and there אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish person מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei and [there was] not among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov a goodlier מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-nu; than מִשִּׁכְמ֣וֹ <S%H7926><s%> mish-shich-Mo than he from his shoulders וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> va-Ma'-lah, and upward גָּבֹ֖הַּ <S%H1364><s%> ga-Vo-ah [he was] higher מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol any הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am. than any of the people

וַתֹּאבַ֙דְנָה֙ <S%H6><s%> vat-to-Vad-nah were lost הָאֲתֹנ֔וֹת <S%H860><s%> ha-'a-to-Not, And the asses לְקִ֖ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> le-Kish of Kish אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi father שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul; Saul's וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said קִ֜ישׁ <S%H7027><s%> kish And Kish אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about שָׁא֣וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul to Saul בְּנ֗וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No, his son קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> kach- Take נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> na now אִתְּךָ֙ <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Cha for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chad now one מֵֽהַנְּעָרִ֔ים <S%H5288><s%> me-han-ne-'a-Rim, of the servants וְק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> ve-Kum with thee and arise לֵ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> Lech, go בַּקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> bak-Kesh seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֲתֹנֹֽת׃ <S%H860><s%> ha-'a-to-Not. the asses

וַיַּעֲבֹ֧ר <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'a-Vor And he passed through בְּהַר־ <S%H2022><s%> be-har- mount אֶפְרַ֛יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim Ephraim וַיַּעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'a-Vor and passed through בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> be-'e-retz- the land שָׁלִ֖שָׁה <S%H8031><s%> sha-Li-shah of Shalisha וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not מָצָ֑אוּ <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza-'u; but they found וַיַּעַבְר֤וּ <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'av-Ru [them] not then they passed through בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> ve-'e-retz- the land שַׁעֲלִים֙ <S%H8171><s%> sha-'a-Lim of Shalim וָאַ֔יִן <S%H369><s%> va-'A-yin, else וַיַּעֲבֹ֥ר <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'a-Vor and [there they were] not and he passed through בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> be-'e-retz- the land יְמִינִ֖י <S%H3227><s%> ye-mi-Ni right וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo did not מָצָֽאוּ׃ <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza-'u. but they found

הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah, they בָּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u [And] when they were come בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz to the land צ֔וּף <S%H6689><s%> Tzuf, of Zuph וְשָׁא֥וּל <S%H7586><s%> ve-sha-'Ul Saul אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar said לְנַעֲר֥וֹ <S%H5288><s%> le-na-'a-Ro to his servant אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo with לְכָ֣ה <S%H1980><s%> le-Chah Come וְנָשׁ֑וּבָה <S%H7725><s%> ve-na-Shu-vah; and let us return פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- or יֶחְדַּ֥ל <S%H2308><s%> yech-Dal leave אָבִ֛י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi lest my father מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- about הָאֲתֹנ֖וֹת <S%H860><s%> ha-'a-to-Not [caring] for the asses וְדָ֥אַג <S%H1672><s%> ve-Da-'ag and take thought לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said ל֗וֹ lo, הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> hin-neh- Behold נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> na now אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- a man אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of God בָּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> ba-'Ir unto him Behold now [there is] in this city הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> haz-Zot, likewise וְהָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-ha-'Ish man נִכְבָּ֔ד <S%H3513><s%> nich-Bad, and [he is] an honourable כֹּ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> kol all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which יְדַבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> ye-dab-Ber all that he saith בּ֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> Bo cometh יָב֑וֹא <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo; surely to pass עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah Now נֵ֣לֲכָה <S%H1980><s%> Ne-la-chah that we should go שָּׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, there אוּלַי֙ <S%H194><s%> 'u-Lai perhaps יַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> yag-Gid thither peradventure he can shew לָ֔נוּ La-nu, אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דַּרְכֵּ֖נוּ <S%H1870><s%> dar-Ke-nu us our way אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which הָלַ֥כְנוּ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Lach-nu have set עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha. and

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul Saul לְנַעֲר֗וֹ <S%H5288><s%> le-na-'a-Ro, to his servant וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold נֵלֵךְ֮ <S%H1980><s%> ne-leCh go וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> u-mah- what נָּבִ֣יא <S%H935><s%> na-Vi what shall we bring לָאִישׁ֒ <S%H376><s%> la-'Ish to the man כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הַלֶּ֙חֶם֙ <S%H3899><s%> hal-Le-chem bread אָזַ֣ל <S%H235><s%> 'a-Zal is spent מִכֵּלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H3627><s%> mik-ke-Lei-nu, in our vessels וּתְשׁוּרָ֥ה <S%H8670><s%> u-te-shu-Rah and [there is] not a present אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- and there לְהָבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> le-ha-Vi to bring לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish to the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God מָ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> mah What אִתָּֽנוּ׃ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ta-nu. for

וַיֹּ֤סֶף <S%H3254><s%> vai-Yo-sef again הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar And the servant לַעֲנ֣וֹת <S%H6030><s%> la-'a-Not answered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, Saul וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said הִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold נִמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> nim-Tza Behold I have בְיָדִ֔י <S%H3027><s%> ve-ya-Di, here at hand רֶ֖בַע <S%H7253><s%> Re-va' the fourth part שֶׁ֣קֶל <S%H8255><s%> She-kel of a shekel כָּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ka-sef; of silver וְנָֽתַתִּי֙ <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti [that] will I give לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish to the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God וְהִגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> ve-hig-Gid to tell לָ֖נוּ La-nu אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דַּרְכֵּֽנוּ׃ <S%H1870><s%> dar-Ke-nu. us our way

לְפָנִ֣ים׀ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nim (Beforetime בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El, in Israel כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- used אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar thus he spake הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish when a man בְּלֶכְתּוֹ֙ <S%H1980><s%> be-lech-To went לִדְר֣וֹשׁ <S%H1875><s%> lid-Roosh to enquire אֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, of God לְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu Come וְנֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> ve-ne-le-Chah go עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against הָרֹאֶ֑ה <S%H7203><s%> ha-ro-'Eh; to the seer כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for לַנָּבִיא֙ <S%H5030><s%> lan-na-Vi [called] a Prophet הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, for [he that is] now יִקָּרֵ֥א <S%H7121><s%> yik-ka-Re called לְפָנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nim was beforetime הָרֹאֶֽה׃ <S%H7203><s%> ha-ro-'Eh. to the seer

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said שָׁא֧וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul Saul לְנַעֲר֛וֹ <S%H5288><s%> le-na-'a-Ro to his servant ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov Well דְּבָרְךָ֖ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-re-Cha Then said לְכָ֣ה׀ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chah come נֵלֵ֑כָה <S%H1980><s%> ne-Le-chah; go וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> vai-ye-le-Chu went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, unto the city אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham in it אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish where the man הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him. of God

הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah, as they עֹלִים֙ <S%H5927><s%> 'o-Lim [And] as they went up בְּמַעֲלֵ֣ה <S%H4608><s%> be-ma-'a-Leh the hill הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, to the city וְהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem-mah they מָצְא֣וּ <S%H4672><s%> ma-tze-'U they found נְעָר֔וֹת <S%H5291><s%> ne-'a-Rot, young maidens יֹצְא֖וֹת <S%H3318><s%> yo-tze-'ot going out לִשְׁאֹ֣ב <S%H7579><s%> lish-'O to draw מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim; water וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and said לָהֶ֔ן la-Hen, הֲיֵ֥שׁ <S%H3426><s%> ha-Yesh unto them Is בָּזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> ba-Zeh to them הָרֹאֶֽה׃ <S%H7203><s%> ha-ro-'Eh. is the seer

וַתַּעֲנֶ֧ינָה <S%H6030><s%> vat-ta-'a-Nei-nah And they answered אוֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam וַתֹּאמַ֥רְנָה <S%H559><s%> vat-to-Mar-nah them and said יֵּ֖שׁ <S%H3426><s%> yesh He is הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh is see לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha; behold [he is] before מַהֵ֣ר׀ <S%H4116><s%> ma-Her you make haste עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah, now כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> hai-yOm to day בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> ba now for he came לָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> la-'Ir, to the city כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for זֶ֧בַח <S%H2077><s%> Ze-vach for [there is] a sacrifice הַיּ֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom to day לָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> la-'Am of the people בַּבָּמָֽה׃ <S%H1116><s%> bab-ba-Mah. in the high place

כְּבֹאֲכֶ֣ם <S%H935><s%> ke-vo-'a-Chem As soon as ye be come הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir into the city כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken ye shall straightway תִּמְצְא֣וּן <S%H4672><s%> tim-tze-'Un find אֹת֡וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To בְּטֶרֶם֩ <S%H2962><s%> be-te-Rem before יַעֲלֶ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Leh him before he go up הַבָּמָ֜תָה <S%H1116><s%> hab-ba-Ma-tah to the high place לֶאֱכֹ֗ל <S%H398><s%> le-'e-Chol, to eat כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> ki because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- will not יֹאכַ֤ל <S%H398><s%> yo-Chal will not eat הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am for the people עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until בֹּא֔וֹ <S%H935><s%> bo-'O, until he come כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hu he יְבָרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-Rech because he doth bless הַזֶּ֔בַח <S%H2077><s%> haz-Ze-vach, the sacrifice אַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei- after that כֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> chen after that יֹאכְל֣וּ <S%H398><s%> yo-che-Lu they eat הַקְּרֻאִ֑ים <S%H7121><s%> hak-ke-ru-'Im; that be bidden וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now עֲל֔וּ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lu, Now therefore get you up כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because אֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To כְהַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> che-hai-Yom for about this time תִּמְצְא֥וּן <S%H4672><s%> tim-tze-'Un ye shall find אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.
